overview: In Meghpeon, the story will have Subhashree playing Titli, the bahu of an aristocratic family, who starts a homestay in their family property. The first guest at the homestay is Meghdoot, the character played by Abir Chatterjee. Meghdoot is a doctor, who is visiting town for work, when he puts up at the homestay. Titil’s husband is Rituparno, played by Jisshu. The story unfolds as a love triangle involving the three characters.
title: Meghpeon
